Pre-Game Insights: The Chris Vernon Show panel reacts to Wednesday’s NBA slate with a focus on an intriguing matchup between the Charlotte Hornets and the Houston Rockets.

Despite having a roster loaded with talent (Fred VanVleet, Alperen Sengun, Jabari Smith, Jalen Green, Reed Sheppard, Dillon Brooks, Amen Thompson, etc.), can they find a way to mesh? Does their roster work or do they have too many redundant players?
